short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can search sites like TransferMarkt, WhoScored and SofaScore practically without visiting the site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this plugin, you can easily search for the text you selected on websites such as transfermarkt, sofascore and whoscored.
